title: Office 365 Failed Login Attempt
description: Detects multiple failed login attempts from the same user within a short time period, potentially indicating a brute force attack.

title: Download of an .RDP file on Sharepoint
description: Detects instances where .rdp files are accessed, downloaded, or copied from SharePoint
query: dataSource.name = 'Microsoft O365' and unmapped.Operation in ('FileDownloaded', 'FileSyncDownloadedFull', 'FileDownloadedFromBrowser', 'FileModifiedExtended', 'FileAccessed', 'FileCopiedToNetworkShare', 'FileCreatedOnRemovableMedia', 'FileCopied') and unmapped.SourceFileExtension = 'rdp'
